project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A web-based platform to improve customer onboarding, engagement, and self-service capabilities.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to log in using their main SaaS product credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can log in using their existing credentials

feature_breakdown.description: Display an onboarding checklist tailored to the customer's subscription level.
acceptance_criteria: Checklists accurately reflect the customer's subscription tier
Customers can track their onboarding progress

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to enable content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily find and access relevant product documentation

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's product usage and feature adoption metrics.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily understand their product usage and adoption trends

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily reach out to their CSM with relevant information

technical_architecture.data_flow: User -> Web Application -> API Gateway -> External APIs -> Data Stores
security_considerations: Implement OAuth 2.0 for secure authentication and authorization
Use TLS 1.2+ for all network communications

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP within 6 months.
deliverables: Integrated with existing systems (SSO, CRM, Knowledge Base)

implementation_phases.description: Implement the customer usage and adoption metrics dashboard.
Enhance the platform with CSM support features.

risk_analysis.description: Potential delays in third-party API integrations
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage with integration partners early, establish clear communication channels, and plan for contingencies

risk_analysis.description: Unexpected complexity in developing the personalized onboarding checklists
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Allocate additional development resources, conduct thorough design and planning, and implement a phased rollout

risk_analysis.description: Challenges in ensuring high performance and scalability
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Implement a comprehensive load testing strategy, optimize application architecture, and provision adequate infrastructure

tools_and_technologies: AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, API Gateway, Lambda)

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
Reduce from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
Increase to 40% of support questions resolved via the portal
success_metrics.measurement_method: Calculated from customer support ticket data
